You can typically upload the required documents, such as academic transcripts, entrance exam scores, and other relevant certificates, through the online application portal. Detailed instructions will be provided on the website.

The process for applying for scholarships typically involves completing a scholarship application form provided by the college. Additional documents such as essays, recommendation letters, or income certificates may also be required. The scholarship application deadlines and requirements will be communicated through the college's official channels.

Yes, we offer merit-based scholarships for engineering students. These scholarships are awarded based on academic excellence, typically considering factors such as your performance in entrance exams and previous academic records.

The cost of tuition and fees for engineering programs may vary. It is advisable to refer to the college's official website or contact the tuition office for the most accurate and up-to-date information regarding tuition fees.

Yes, our college often provides payment plans or installment options to assist students in managing their tuition payments. You can inquire about the available payment plans and options at the college's tuition office.
